advertiser_name: Ricky Frazier Construction Trucking and Grading / Custom Farming
ad_text: Ricky Frazier Construction Trucking and Grading / Custom Farming Sponsored We are looking to hire several individuals who are motivated, dependable and ready to work. Job duties will vary from day to day. Need laborers, equipment operators and truck drivers. Drivers license with clean driving record is a plus and must be able to pass random drug screenings. We also need truck drivers with class A or B CDL’s with a clean driving record. Salary is based on experience. For more information please call 336-498-4437. FULL-TIME · RANDLEMAN, NORTH CAROLINA Truck Driver/Equipment operator/Laborer Apply now
